Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: lastar
Reviews.Content: Does what is needed and can add to mobile phone and computer and view cameras from anywhere. A steal for the price!

ProductInfo.Features:
Dual Stream H.264 Codec Records Highest Quality To Hard Drive & Optimizes Internet Transmission Speed Simultaneously
500Gb Hard Drive Included, Expandable Up To 2Tb
Email and Sms Text Messages Can Be Sent With Images When Activity Is Detected
Monitor and Control Select Functions Via The Internet With A Pc Or Smartphone
Selectable Grid Video Motion Detection Pinpoints Areas To Be Covered & Helps Eliminate False Alarms
ProductInfo.Name: Security Labs SLD254 4-Channel DVR (Black)
